languages.text: "Единица испытывает иррациональное чувство удовлетворения от смерти ксеноединицы Маражай. Природа феномена аномальна".
"The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
languages.original_text: "Единица испытывает иррациональное чувство удовлетворения от смерти ксеноединицы Маражай. Природа феномена аномальна".

traits.locale_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “本单位由于异形单位玛拉斋的死亡而产生了某种非理性的满足感，这样的现象很是反常。”
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: “本单位由于异形单位玛拉斋的死亡而产生了某种非理性的满足感，这样的现象很是反常。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'unité éprouve une satisfaction irrationnelle suite à la mort de l'unité xénos Marazhai. La nature de ce phénomène est des plus irrégulières. »
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: « L'unité éprouve une satisfaction irrationnelle suite à la mort de l'unité xénos Marazhai. La nature de ce phénomène est des plus irrégulières. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta unidad experimenta una sensación irracional de satisfacción ante la muerte de la xenounidad Marazhai. La naturaleza del fenómeno es anómala».
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: «Esta unidad experimenta una sensación irracional de satisfacción ante la muerte de la xenounidad Marazhai. La naturaleza del fenómeno es anómala».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「当ユニットは異種族ユニット、マラズハイの死に非合理的な満足感を抱いている。自然現象とは異常なものだな」
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: 「当ユニットは異種族ユニット、マラズハイの死に非合理的な満足感を抱いている。自然現象とは異常なものだな」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Einheit erlebt ein irrationales Gefühl der Befriedigung ausgelöst durch den Tod der Xeno-Einheit Marazhai. Das Wesen dieses Phänomens ist anomal."
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: "Die Einheit erlebt ein irrationales Gefühl der Befriedigung ausgelöst durch den Tod der Xeno-Einheit Marazhai. Das Wesen dieses Phänomens ist anomal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

languages.text: "Birim, zeno birimi Marazhai'ın ölümü sebebiyle orantısız bir memnuniyet hissi yaşıyor. Olgunun doğası anormal."
languages.original_text: "The unit is experiencing an irrational sense of satisfaction at the death of the xeno-unit Marazhai. The nature of the phenomenon is anomalous."

traits.locale_text: "Birim, zeno birimi Marazhai'ın ölümü sebebiyle orantısız bir memnuniyet hissi yaşıyor. Olgunun doğası anormal."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
